All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Help
Help window displays help information.
HomePage
HomePage is the home page window of this wordle game, includes: TITLE_1: "WORDLE" TITLE_2: "GAME" start Button: start game help Button: view help
LetterBlock
LetterBlock class defines the style of 4 different letter blocks.
Main
Main class is where the program starts, includes main method.
MessageTextField
MessageTextField defines the style and content of top and bottom message textField.
Result
Result is a final window of each round of game.
TxtReader
TxtReader reads words.txt file, chooses a word as answer to guess, and compares players input with word list.
Wordle
Wordle is the game window.
